name: Freeze-Frame
description:
Freeze-Frame is my submission to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Only been seriously programming for a few months so my main goal was to submit a project by the deadline

Freeze-Frame is a puzzle platformer where you have 2 characters bound together with a rope. You use TAB to swap between them. Inactive characters are frozen (even midair), giving them many applications such as using them as pivot points for swinging off of.
